content: The concept is really quite simple. It is a bit like real-time Risk, in fact, without the cards or continents. Just grab as much space as you can, as each area gives you more units. It gets very fast & furious, especially on large maps! Maps are also well-designed and do get more difficult as you go.  There should be more documentation! Tips: 1. Press and drag from one base to another to set a constant flow of units in that direction.  2. tap twice to cancel this instruction. 3. with 5+ units, you can either set a base to double its output of units or 'defend' (two buttons on the left, top & bottom respectively). Defend seems to double units' effectiveness and/or kill all invaders if you have less (not certain). 4. larger bases with more bars produce faster.
